body:
### Problem

```
$ uname -a
Darwin mbp13.domain.local 24.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 24.3.0: Thu Jan  2 20:22:00 PST 2025; root:xnu-11215.81.4~3/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
$ cc --version
Apple clang version 16.0.0 (clang-1600.0.26.6)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin24.3.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin
$ ls -l /usr/local/lib/libiconv.*
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel  994040 28 Feb 15:48 /usr/local/lib/libiconv.2.dylib*
lrwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel      16 28 Feb 15:48 /usr/local/lib/libiconv.dylib@ -> libiconv.2.dylib
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel     905 28 Feb 15:48 /usr/local/lib/libiconv.la*
```

```
$ make
...
/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/bin/cmake --build build
[  0%] Built target nvim_runtime_deps
[  0%] Built target update_version_stamp
[  5%] Built target nlua0
[  5%] Linking C executable ../../bin/nvim
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_libiconv", referenced from:
      _buf_write_convert_with_iconv in bufwrite.c.o
      _buf_write_convert_with_iconv in bufwrite.c.o
      _readfile in fileio.c.o
      _my_iconv_open in mbyte.c.o
      _iconv_string in mbyte.c.o
  "_libiconv_close", referenced from:
      _buf_write in bufwrite.c.o
      _readfile in fileio.c.o
      _readfile in fileio.c.o
      _readfile in fileio.c.o
      _my_iconv_open in mbyte.c.o
      _convert_setup_ext in mbyte.c.o
  "_libiconv_open", referenced from:
      _my_iconv_open in mbyte.c.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
cc: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[3]: *** [bin/nvim] Error 1
make[2]: *** [src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
make: *** [nvim] Error 2
```

### Steps to reproduce

```
$ git checkout -b v0.10 origin/release-0.10
$ make distclean
$ make
```

### Expected behavior

`nvim` binary produced.

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

ecaece926e [origin/release-0.10]

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

N/A

### Operating system/version

macOS 15.3.1

### Terminal name/version

alacritty 0.15.1 (1)

### $TERM environment variable

tmux-256color

### Installation

https://github.com/neovim/neovim.git

labels.description: building and installing Neovim using the provided scripts
labels.name: build

title: Building fails on Intel Mac  - linking to _libiconv (/usr/local/lib/libiconv*)
